Easy.Q: If there are 8 zebras and 3 run off to graze, how many zebras are left?
If there are 6 monkeys and 2 climb a tree, how many monkeys are left on the ground?
If there are 10 parrots and 4 fly away, how many parrots are left?
If there are 7 lions and 3 leave the pride, how many lions are left?
If there are 9 turtles and 4 crawl into the water, how many turtles are left on the shore?
If there are 5 giraffes and 1 moves to another tree, how many giraffes are left?
If there are 6 deer and 2 hide in the forest, how many deer are left?
If there are 8 elephants and 5 walk away, how many elephants are left?
If there are 10 flamingos and 6 fly off, how many flamingos are left?
If there are 12 snakes and 7 slither away, how many snakes are left?
If there are 11 cows and 2 moo loudly, how many cows are left?
If there are 12 sheep and 5 go to the meadow, how many sheep are left?
If there are 7 chickens and 1 returns to the coop, how many are left?
If there are 13 frogs and 6 jump into the pond, how many frogs are left?
If there are 15 horses and 4 gallop away, how many horses are left?
If there are 14 goats and 3 walk up the hill, how many goats are left?
If there are 10 dogs and 3 chase their tails, how many dogs are left?
If there are 14 cats and 5 nap in the sun, how many cats are left awake?
If there are 13 birds and 7 fly south, how many birds remain?
If there are 4 fish and 1 swims away, how many fish are left?
If there are 15 bees and 8 fly to flowers, how many bees are left in the hive?
If there are 9 bears and 6 go fishing, how many bears stay behind?
If there are 12 rabbits and 5 hop into the garden, how many rabbits are left in the field?
If there are 11 ducks and 4 waddle away, how many ducks are left?
If there are 6 pigs and 2 roll in the mud, how many pigs are clean?
If there are 5 cows and 3 enter the barn, how many cows are outside?
If there are 8 chickens and 4 lay eggs, how many chickens are not laying eggs?
If there are 10 squirrels and 5 gather nuts, how many squirrels are left in the tree?
If there are 7 frogs and 2 leap into the pond, how many frogs are on the bank?
If there are 9 mice and 4 hide in the cheese, how many mice are visible?
If there are 13 ladybugs and 6 fly away, how many ladybugs are left on the leaf?
If there are 14 ants and 5 carry food, how many ants are not carrying food?
If there are 10 butterflies and 3 flutter away, how many butterflies remain?
If there are 11 hamsters and 6 run on wheels, how many hamsters are resting?

Medium.Q: If there are 18 zebras and 9 run off to graze, how many zebras are left?
If there are 20 leopards and 8 chase after prey, how many leopards are left?
If there are 25 flamingos and 10 fly away, how many flamingos are left?
If there are 30 antelopes and 12 run into the bushes, how many antelopes are left?
If there are 22 crocodiles and 7 dive underwater, how many crocodiles are left?
If there are 24 rhinos and 6 wander off, how many rhinos are left?
If there are 28 camels and 14 move to another oasis, how many camels are left?
If there are 26 penguins and 11 slide into the water, how many penguins are left?
If there are 19 buffalo and 8 run into the woods, how many buffalo are left?
If there are 21 foxes and 9 sneak into their dens, how many foxes are left?
If there are 17 kangaroos and 5 hop away, how many are left?
If there are 23 wolves and 9 howl at the moon, how many wolves are silent?
If there are 27 pandas and 13 eat bamboo, how many pandas are not eating?
If there are 29 koalas and 15 climb trees, how many koalas are on the ground?
If there are 16 otters and 7 swim away, how many otters are left?
If there are 25 seals and 11 dive into the water, how many seals remain on the ice?
If there are 19 raccoons and 6 raid the trash, how many raccoons are elsewhere?
If there are 22 beavers and 8 build dams, how many beavers are not building?
If there are 24 moose and 10 wander into the forest, how many moose are left?
If there are 30 eagles and 15 fly away, how many eagles remain?
If there are 28 hawks and 12 soar high, how many hawks are perched?
If there are 26 squirrels and 9 gather nuts, how many squirrels are left?
If there are 20 rabbits and 7 hop into the garden, how many rabbits are outside?
If there are 18 deer and 6 graze in the field, how many deer are resting?
If there are 21 foxes and 10 hunt for food, how many foxes are in the den?
If there are 23 bears and 12 fish in the river, how many bears are elsewhere?
If there are 27 coyotes and 14 howl, how many coyotes are quiet?
If there are 29 armadillos and 17 curl into balls, how many are uncurled?
If there are 24 porcupines and 11 climb trees, how many are on the ground?
If there are 19 skunks and 9 spray, how many skunks didn't spray?
If there are 17 possums and 8 play dead, how many are active?
If there are 25 turkeys and 15 gobble, how many turkeys are silent?
If there are 28 geese and 13 fly south, how many geese stay behind?

Hard.Q: If there are 100 gazelles and 45 leap away, how many gazelles are left?
If there are 150 flamingos and 75 fly away, how many flamingos are left?
If there are 200 tigers and 88 move to another jungle, how many tigers are left?
If there are 300 elephants and 125 migrate to another area, how many elephants are left?
If there are 275 giraffes and 100 wander off, how many giraffes are left?
If there are 400 monkeys and 150 swing away into the trees, how many monkeys are left?
If there are 500 deer and 200 run into the forest, how many deer are left?
If there are 450 seals and 225 dive into the ocean, how many seals are left?
If there are 600 wolves and 300 run into the mountains, how many wolves are left?
If there are 800 kangaroos and 400 hop away, how many kangaroos are left?
If there are 120 buffalo and 50 stampede, how many buffalo are left?
If there are 250 cheetahs and 80 sprint after prey, how many cheetahs are left?
If there are 350 eagles and 120 fly to the mountains, how many eagles remain?
If there are 180 zebras and 90 gallop away, how many zebras are left?
If there are 220 rhinos and 110 charge, how many rhinos are calm?
If there are 600 lions and 250 hunt, how many lions are resting?
If there are 700 hyenas and 300 laugh, how many hyenas are silent?
If there are 900 crows and 450 fly to the east, how many crows remain?
If there are 150 gorillas and 60 beat their chests, how many gorillas are quiet?
If there are 320 elephants and 140 trumpet loudly, how many elephants are silent?
If there are 450 tigers and 200 prowl the jungle, how many tigers are resting?
If there are 550 leopards and 275 climb trees, how many leopards are on the ground?
If there are 750 pandas and 325 eat bamboo, how many pandas are not eating?
